Generating some data

```{r}
rho <- 0.9
planned_visits <- c(0, 1, 3, 6, 12, 18)
n <- 100L
vcov <- as.matrix(0.8^dist(planned_visits)) + diag(length(planned_visits)) # 'spatial' exponential
tbl_data <- expand.grid(
    id = factor(1:n),
    month = planned_visits
  )
tbl_data$y <- as.vector(t(matrix(rnorm(n * length(planned_visits)), nrow = n) %*% chol(vcov)))
```

```{r}
fit <- fit_mmrm(y ~ sp_exp(month | id), data = tbl_data, weights = rep(1, nrow(tbl_data)))

predict(fit, tbl_data)
```
